thread.title: Major Fire Update Details - NSW Rural Fire Service
thread.title_full: Major Fire Update Details - NSW Rural Fire Service

title: Major Fire Update Details - NSW Rural Fire Service

organizations.name: major fire update details - nsw rural fire service

text:
Watch and Act - Belubula Way, Mandurama (Blayney LGA) 2017-02-17 16:37 Posted: 2017-02-17 16:37 
A grass fire is burning near Belubula Way, to the west of Mandurama. The fire is burning in an easterly direction along Belubula Way towards Lyndhurst and Belubula. 
Current Situation 
The fire is burning in a south easterly direction along Belubula Way towards Lyndhurst and Belubula. 
With conditions easing, firefighters are now slowing the spread of the fire. 
Advice 
If you are in the area of Lyndhurst and Mandurama monitor conditions and follow direction from firefighters in the area. 
Be prepared to enact your bush fire survival plan. 
The Mid Western Highway currently remains open. 
Other Information If your life is at risk, call Triple Zero (000) immediately. Continue to stay up to date with the bush fire situation by checking http://www.rfs.nsw.gov.au , listening to your local radio station or by calling the NSW RFS Bush Fire Information Line on 1800 679 737. If you live in the area but are away from home, it may not be safe to return to your property. For information on road closures, check http://livetraffic.rta.nsw.gov.au . Roads may be closed without warning.
